docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, Jan. 2. -- Bishop's purple was a favorite color for afternoon and evening, with combinations of white, last Winter, and recently I have noticed several exquisite models of the same commingling for dinner and evening gowns. Last season the two -purple and white -- were used in the same draping.

headline.main: Purples, with Combinations of White, Favorite Colors in Paris Fashions --- Fur Trimmings for Evening Wear Dominant.; THE WORLD OF FASHION IN PARIS.
